overview: After I saw Samantha Bentley in 'Perfect Slaves,' I wanted to experience her... She never says 'stop' to anything. This is the best part of a perfect slave. Also, my first scene with Henessy - her level is always so high. I love Samia; her ass is unbelievable and her energy is amazing! Lynn and Mira Sunset - those teens look like sisters in a very fantastic scene with Omar.  The scene with Henessy and Samantha was awarded "Best Sex Scene In A Foreign Shot Production" in AVN 2015.
title: Rocco's Perfect Slaves 2
